trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to make a link. Try selecting only simple text.
trans-unit.target: Bloom was not able to make a link. Try selecting only simple text.

trans-unit.source: In this context, "simple" text means text that is selected from within a single paragraph and is not associated with multiple audio recordings or split audio segments. Also certain selections involving formatted text can be a problem if the whole word is not selected.
trans-unit.target: In this context, "simple" text means text that is selected from within a single paragraph and is not associated with multiple audio recordings or split audio segments. Also certain selections involving formatted text can be a problem if the whole word is not selected.
